name: Quick Play Trivia
description: Test your knowledge with 10 quick trivia questions
rules: Answer 10 questions within the time limit. Each correct answer earns points.

name: Career Challenge
description: Guess the player or team based on career clues
rules: You'll be given clues about a player or team's career. Guess who it is!

name: True or False Blitz
rules: Answer as many true or false questions as you can in 30 seconds.

name: Stat Master
description: Given a stat, guess the correct player or year
rules: You'll be shown a statistic. Guess which player achieved it or in which year it happened.

name: Year in Review
description: Identify events from a specific year in the sport
rules: Answer questions about events that happened in a specific year.
